title: Appendix A — Randomized Response Technique
text:
The Randomized Response Technique is used for handling sensitive questions in surveys. It allows respondents to answer sensitive questions truthfully while maintaining their privacy.
My user guide will cover a brief introduction to what RRT is, how it works, and why it is useful. I will also cover when the appropriate time to use RRT and examples of how it might be implemented. It will include how to set up an RRT survey in R and the packages needed to implement it.
